name: Real Printer 1
description: A basic cheap printer that is easy to use and has a large community of users.

name: Benchy
description: A basic test print that is used to test the quality of a printer.

name: hydroponics kit
description: A hydroponics tub with all the basic features you need to grow your own plants.

name: white PLA filament
description: 1 gram of white PLA filament for an FDM printer.

name: Edison Model M
description: A futuristic electric vehicle with Fully Supervised Driving (FSD) capabilities.

name: portable solar panel
description: A portable solar panel, with support for 200W at peak sunpower. Standard DC Output.

name: 200 Wh battery pack
description: A 200 Wh battery pack that can be used to store energy from a solar panel or a wind turbine.

name: 500W wind turbine
description: A 500W wind turbine that can be used to generate electricity.

name: Benchy Award
description: A trophy granted for printing your first Benchy.

name: Beginner hydroponics tub
description: A hydroponics tub with all the basic features you need to grow your own plants.

name: basil seeds
description: A packet of basil seeds.

name: 3D printed model rocket
description: A 3D-printed model rocket that can be used to launch small payloads into space.

name: green PLA filament
description: 1 gram of green PLA filament for an FDM printer.

name: hydroponic starter plug
description: 1 rockwool starter plug for hydroponic seed germination.

name: hydroponics nutrients
description: A bottle of hydroponics nutrients that can be used to grow plants. NPK: 9-3-6

name: 3D printing kit
description: A kit that contains all the parts you need to get started with 3D printing. Everything is fully assembled.

name: 5 gallon bucket
description: A 5 gallon bucket that can be used to store water or other liquids.

name: 5 gallon bucket of tap water (chlorinated)
description: A 5 gallon bucket of water. This water is chlorinated and should not be used for hydroponics.

name: Motor Award
description: A trophy granted for being one of the first people to buy an Edison Model M

name: Rocket Award
description: A trophy granted for printing your first model rocket.

name: dCarbon
description: A token that is generated for every 1 kg of carbon dioxide generated in-game.

name: Hypercar (80% charge)
description: A futuristic electric vehicle with Fully Supervised Driving (FSD) capabilities. 80% charged.

name: dWatt
description: A token that represents 1 watt of electricity that can be consumed by machines. To acquire 1 dWatt, you need to either prepay the dCarbon cost, or generate and store it in a battery without accruing dCarbon.

name: Hypervan
description: A futuristic electric van with Fully Supervised Driving (FSD) capabilities.

name: dUSD
description: An in-game tokenized version of the USD currency. Not backed by or in any way associated with actual USD.

name: 5 gallon bucket of tap water (dechlorinated)
description: A 5 gallon bucket of water. This water is dechlorinated and can be used for hydroponics.

name: soaked hydroponic starter plug
description: A hydroponic starter plug soaked in water. Used to germinate seeds.

name: basil seedling
description: A basil seedling that has been germinated in a rockwool cube.

name: sink
description: Generates tap water.

name: smart plug
description: A smart plug that plugs into a wall outlet to measure energy usage.

name: 3D printed nosecone
description: A nosecone for a modular model rocket.

name: 3D printed body tube
description: A body tube for a modular model rocket.

name: 3D printed fincan
description: A fincan for a modular model rocket.

name: 3D printed nosecone coupler
description: A nosecone coupler for a modular model rocket.

name: hobbyist solid rocket motor
description: 18mm in diameter, 70mm long, weighing 17.9g. Max thrust: 31.3 Newtons. Thrust duration: 0.80s.

name: superglue
description: Don't get it on your hands!

name: kevlar shock cord
description: Perfect for model rocketry. Used to attach the rocket body to the parachute.

name: rocket igniter
description: Ignite a rocket motor with electricity.

name: launch controller
description: A controller for launching model rockets.

name: launch-capable model rocket
description: A model rocket ready for launch. Ignite remotely using the launch controller.

name: damaged model rocket
description: Badly damaged and broken in several places.

name: Rocketeer Award
description: Awarded for launching your first rocket!

name: harvestable basil plant
description: A basil plant that is ready to be harvested. Growing medium: rockwool.

name: hydroponic grow lamp
description: Nice pink lighting that completely changes the vibe of your room. Also used for growing plants. Energy consumption: 36W.

name: hydroponics tub (ready)
description: A hydroponic tub that is ready to be used. Contains a nutrient solution suitable for most leafy greens.

name: hydroponics tub (nutrient deficient)
description: A hydroponic tub that is ready to be used. Contains a nutrient solution suitable for most leafy greens.

name: bundle of basil leaves
description: A bundle of basil leaves. Maybe we can make pesto in the future? For now, maybe just sell it.

name: harvested basil plant
description: A basil plant that has been freshly harvested. Don't worry, it'll grow back eventually!

name: Green Thumb Award
description: Awarded for growing and harvesting your first batch of hydroponic basil!

name: Solarpunk Award
description: Awarded for generating dWatt using solar panels!

name: Completionist Award
description: Awarded for completing all of the quests avaialble on January 1, 2023.

name: aquarium (150 L)
description: A glass tank for housing fish.

name: aquarium (goldfish) (150 L)
description: An aquarium containing a goldfish.

name: goldfish
description: A goldfish.

name: goldfish food
description: Food suitable for a goldfish.

name: aquarium filter
description: A filter for a fish tank.

name: aquarium heater
description: A heater for a fish tank.

name: aquarium light
description: A light for a fish tank.

name: Thermometer
description: A thermometer for measuring temperature.

name: pH strip
description: A pH strip for measuring pH.

name: 7 pH freshwater aquarium (150 L)
description: An freshwater aquarium with a pH of 7.

name: dSolar
description: a token that represents 1 Watt of energy generated using a solar panel.

name: gravel
description: Loose gravel suitable for use in an aquarium.

name: aquarium net
description: A net for catching fish.

name: dGoldfish
description: A token granted for feeding a goldfish

name: Fish Friend Award
description: An award given for setting up your first goldfish aquarium.

name: parachute
description: A parachute for model rockets.

name: launch-capable model rocket (parachute)
description: A reusable rocket with a parachute

name: Rocket Descent (animated)
description: A rocket descending to the ground with a parachute.

name: dLaunch
description: 1 dLaunch = 1 launch of a rocket. Any launch counts, even a model rocket launch.

name: dOffset
description: 1 dOffset is granted for reducing dCarbon with dUSD.

name: Tree Hugger Award
description: Awarded for converting dCarbon to dOffset.

name: dBI
description: Awarded for every dUSD earned through Basic Income. See the Wallet page for more details.

name: EV charger
description: A charger for electric vehicles.

name: Hypercar (20% charge)
description: A futuristic electric vehicle with Fully Supervised Driving (FSD) capabilities. 20% charged.

name: Hypercar (animated)
description: A hypercar driving down the road.

name: 1 kWh battery pack
description: A 1kWh Wh battery pack that can be used to store energy from a solar panel or a wind turbine.

name: The grass is always greener (still)
description: A still image of a Hypercar on a grassy field.

name: dChat
description: An offline-first conversational digital assistant. You ask it questions, it answers! Powered by LLMs!

name: Solar charge controller
description: A charge controller for a solar panel. Used to regular the voltage and current from a solar panel to protect the battery.

name: Small solar enclosure
description: A solar enclosure with enough room for a single panel, a charge controller, and a 200 Wh battery.

name: Solar setup (200 Wh)
description: A 200 W solar panel, charge controller, and 200 Wh battery in a weatherproof enclosure. Ready to use!

name: Solar setup (1 kWh)
description: A 200 W solar panel, charge controller, and 1 kWh battery in a weatherproof enclosure. Ready to use!

name: Model rocket launchpad
description: A launchpad for model rockets.

name: flame-resistant recovery wadding
description: Protects parachute from heat, ensuring safe deployment without burning risks. Essential for model rocket recovery.

name: Early Adopter Token
description: The early bird gets the worm.

name: Newcomer Token
description: You're new here, aren't you?
